channel.title: 配置 on Amor
channel.description: Recent content in 配置 on Amor

item.title: oh my zsh config
item.description: # If you come from bash you might have to change your $PATH. # export PATH=$HOME/bin:/usr/local/bin:$PATH # Path to your oh-my-zsh installation. export ZSH="/Users/amor/.oh-my-zsh" # Set name of the theme to load --- if set to "random", it will # load a random theme each time oh-my-zsh is loaded, in which case, # to know which specific one was loaded, run: echo $RANDOM_THEME # See https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/wiki/Themes ZSH_THEME="agnoster" # Set list of themes to pick from when loading at random # Setting this variable when ZSH_THEME=random will cause zsh to load # a theme from this variable instead of looking in ~/.
